body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
A summary of reviews will appear here.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#bitcoin-core/gui/733](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/733) (Deniability - a tool to automatically improve coin ownership privacy by denavila)
* [#bitcoin-core/gui/650](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/650) (Add Import to Wallet GUI by KolbyML)
* [#27920](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27920) (wallet: bugfix, always use apostrophe for spkm descriptor ID by furszy)
* [#27792](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27792) (wallet: Deniability API (Unilateral Transaction Meta-Privacy) by denavila)
* [#27425](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27425) (test: move remaining rand code from util/setup_common to util/random by jonatack)
* [#27307](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27307) (wallet: track mempool conflicts with wallet transactions by ishaanam)
* [#26840](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26840) (refactor: importpubkey, importprivkey, importaddress, importmulti, and importdescriptors rpc by KolbyML)
* [#26836](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26836) (wallet: simplify addressbook migration and encapsulate access by furszy)
* [#26728](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26728) (wallet: Have the wallet store the key for automatically generated descriptors by achow101)
* [#26596](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26596) (wallet: Migrate legacy wallets to descriptor wallets without requiring BDB by achow101)
* [#26567](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26567) (Wallet: estimate the size of signed inputs using descriptors by darosior)
* [#26152](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26152) (Bump unconfirmed ancestor transactions to target feerate by Xekyo)
* [#26008](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26008) (wallet: cache IsMine scriptPubKeys to improve performance of descriptor wallets by achow101)
* [#25907](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25907) (wallet: rpc to add automatically generated descriptors by achow101)
* [#25881](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25881) (wallet: remove unused DummySignTx and CKeyPool from GetReservedDestination by furszy)
* [#25273](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25273) (wallet: Pass through transaction locktime and preset input sequences and scripts to CreateTransaction by achow101)
* [#24914](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24914) (wallet: Load database records in a particular order by achow101)
* [#22838](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22838) (descriptors: Be able to specify change and receiving in a single descriptor string by achow101)
* [#22341](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22341) (rpc: add getxpub by Sjors)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

<!--cf906140f33d8803c4a75a2196329ecb-->
ð This pull request conflicts with the target branch and [needs rebase](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#rebasing-changes).
